DOC.brief_summary: The investigator perform study investigate pain prevention preoperative topical nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAID ) photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) use time serial pain scoring .
DOC.brief_title: Time Serial Analysis Preemptive Analgesia Preoperative Topical Diclofenac Ketorolac Photorefractive Keratectomy ( PRK )
DOC.criteria: 1. least 19 year age 2. simultaneous bilateral PRK schedule 3. 400μm ( include epithelium ) postoperative corneal thickness 4. less 150μm ablation depth . 1. history ocular surgery trauma 2. twodiopter difference spherical equivalent ( SE ) eye , 3. keratoconus corneal pathology 4. use systemic topical NSAID within 1 month surgery 5. history allergic reaction aspirin NSAIDs 6. glaucoma ocular hypertension ( > 20 mmHg ) 7. collagen vascular diseases 8. diabetic retinopathy 9. pregnancy lactation 10. intraoperative complication .
